attributes.title: RIP my dog.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app 3 weeks ago, just yesterday it actually let me use the app. App didn’t download and once it finally did when I clicked on the app it would take me back to my home screen. Once I finally got the app to work it would make a very loud screeching noise to where all the oranges on my counter in the kitchen fell on the floor and my dog ate all of the oranges. We had to take my dog to the emergency room because the oranges were toxic to my dog. My dog died. All thanks to this app my dog is now dead

attributes.title: Wouldn’t recommend
attributes.review:
So as soon as I clicked “download” it look about 4 hours to and even on top of that it was super slow and kept glitching out causing my phone to start to glitch as well and make a weird sort of ring that really seemed to bother my dog. When I say my mom started to glitch I mean I couldn’t open and any apps only the “trump 2020” one and it forced me to just look at the dumb over priced merch and stare at a rapist/ racists face for TO long. 
So over all I do not recommend this app✨

attributes.title: slow and steals your information
attributes.userName: I'm just doing this to get coins
attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app for my news information it was working just fine. But that only lasted for a couple hours when it started glitching and taking almost 3 HOURS TO LOAD! I was not impressed with this app at all. The other thing is that I went into privacy settings and realized it had taken ALL of my contacts, pictures, and log ins. Spread the word!!! Don’t let others get hacked by this horrible technology!!

attributes.title: Resting Dumb Trump Face

attributes.title: Waste of effort
attributes.review:
This app is such poor quality that it drains my battery by 20% just by having it open for 7 minutes. Also, I tried to close out of the app and my phone froze and shut off. I should not be having these problems since I have an IPhone 11 with an updated system and all my other regular app work perfectly. The content on this app is completely useless and I pity anyone who sincerely, regularly uses this app. 

Have a good day, love yourself💜
